content: I'm currently running a campaign targeting people interested in photography and entrepreneurship, as those are the main themes of my business. I've set a daily budget of $20, and I'm using a cost per click bidding strategy. I've been trying to optimize my ad creative by using high-quality images and clear headlines, but I'm not sure if my targeting is specific enough. I learned from the workshop that it's important to have a clear target audience in mind, but I'm not sure how to narrow it down further. I've also been trying to use some of the SEO tips I learned to improve my website's visibility, but I'm not sure if it's helping my Facebook Ads performance.
